ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My Lord, rescue me and my family from what they are doing.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (And prayed:) "O Lord, save me and my family from what they do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My Lord, deliver me and my family from their wicked deeds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, save me and my family from their deeds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “My Lord, rescue me and my family from their deeds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My Lord! deliver me and my followers from what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My Lord, deliver me and my people from that they do.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My Lord! Save me and my household from what they do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My Lord, save me and my family from their evil doings."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: My Lord! deliver me and my household from that which they work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘My Lord! Deliver me and my family from what they do.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My Lord, save me and my people from that they are doing'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “My Lord, save me and my family from what they do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:169] My Lord, deliver me and my family from what they do’, that is, from the punishment for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (My Lord! Save me and my household from what they do.
